house_listing.house_description: Gorgeous 3/4 acre wooded lot. New home to be built with open floor plan - vaulted great room, gourmet kitchen, hardwood floors, and more. Call now - you can customize. Brick & vinyl exterior. Best new construction value in great neck.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic Fan, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Pantry, Walk-In Closet(s)
